text:
But I think we are all
seeing the challenge
that we're facing in terms of weather,
climate transition, food.

When you focus on carbon,
you can also change the way

that you create your
products and services,

change the way that you
work with your suppliers,
and really build a sustainable business.
So the first thing that we decided
when we started to work with AWS
is how can we have a platform
and a technology that is reliable

so our customers understand
that their climate data
is as important as their financial data
or their operational data?

Observability and
monitoring of our platform
is very important for us.

We have a better
understanding of our stack,
better understanding of our data assets,

better understand about
the different customers
that we run in different environments,
in different regions all over the world,
and how the observability
and how the monitoring tools of AWS
really help us to understand if this area

of the product is serving at
the right time of the customer,

we are actually, we're
able to deliver the data

to our customers five times
faster than in other platforms.

So I think having the
possibility to use platforms

such as Prometheus or
Argo allow the customer
to really understand what's going on

through the data journey
that they are doing.

In each one of those
steps, using AWS Stack,
our customers can feel confident

that they know their data
is always most secure,
auditable, and ready for what needs

that they have in terms
of decarbonization.
